duties.duty: Experience with code versioning tools (such as Git).

Experience with common front-end development tools such as Babel, Webpack, NPM, etc.
Developing new user-facing features using React.js.
Experience in creating a REST API for working with a collection.

Preparation of accounting, statistical and tax reporting, submission via electronic communication channels.

Execution of operations on payment cards at the request of clients.

Providing technical assistance in the preparation of methodological and educational documents (materials).
Control over the execution of management orders.
